pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ tīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.3: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe…. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
